name: CHAOSNOW
description:
Did you ever want to be alone when you ski? Are you tired of those annoying skiers?  We have the solution for you: In Chaosnow, you control a snowman who skies down a mountain as far as he can.  However, he is not the kind skier. He won't hesitate to kill every skier in his way.  Geared up with you best weapons and don't stop skiing until you are first in the leaderbooard!
